LOOP.COMMENT: Ping the specified servers one by one

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Append the server names to the ServerRes for sending mail

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Initialize ServerRes with the first non-responding Server

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Append the non-responding server to the ServerRes

Values.value:
Please check the following %functionalType% servers as they are not responding:
%ServerRes%

INVOKE.COMMENT: Send the mail with the non-responding servers

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Catch the errors occured in Try sequence

MAP.COMMENT: Append the service name to error message

Values.value:
While invoking the pingServer service getting following error
%lastError/error%

INVOKE.COMMENT: Display the error mesage on server log
Send the mail with the non-responding servers
